title: John Muir National Historic Site: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning       2016 Strentzel-Muir Gravesite Environmental Assessment Comments due by July 11, 2016 Comments can be made the following ways:  1. PREFERRED METHOD (website): Planning, Environment, and Public Comment website: http://parkplanning.nps.gov/JOMU  2. Email: e-mail us 3. In writing, mail to: Superintendent, John Muir National Historic Site ATTN: Gravesite Plan 4202 Alhambra Ave. Martinez CA 94553       Other Planning: GENERAL MANAGEMENT PLAN for the John Muir National Historic Site  DOWNLOAD HERE.
